item.title: Datasets & Funding for South Asia
item.description: Datasets on South Asia Columbia University maintains a fantastic list of datasets for India, Nepal, and Sri Lanka Berkeley also has a list of datasets for South Asia Funding Sources Below is a list of research funding sources for Ph.D. students studying South Asia. I’ll keep updating it over time. If there are any resources I have missed, please feel free to e-mail me and I’d be happy to add them.
